name: Coloravirus
description:
[Español]

Es un juego arcade en el que hay que esquivar distintos enemigos para poder salvar a la humanidad de un virus que ha infectado al planeta. Este juego fué creado para la Global Game Jam de Mendoza, irónicamente antes de que el virus COVID-19 se convirtiera en una pandemia.

[English]

It's an arcade game in which you have to dodge different enemies to save the humanity from an infection. This game was created for the Global Game Jam from Mendoza, ironically before the COVID-19 virus became a pandemic. The game language is only in spanish.
